column4: anybody know how I can add a 1280x1024 resolution in ubuntu so my 19" flatpanel will quit screaming at me that it's out of native resolution? im stuck at 1024x768
you can add it by editing "/etc/X11/xorg.conf
you really should not use the root user account for things like that
exactly what are you doing with that command
it should prompt you for a password then open the file for you
have you tried removing the resolutions you dont want? keep in mind you may need to put them back in if it does not work
I once removed the other resolutions from a friends install and it worked straight away
have you tried what I said
about removing all other resolutions but the one you want
so what happened after you restarted once you left 1280x1024 by itself
